p: Table 2 shows the ionic conductivity of the chitosan hydrogel with varying NaCl salt contents (0, 0.5 and 1.0% w v −1). As expected, the conductivity increased with increasing the salt content. It can be seen that 1% w v −1 NaCl exhibited the highest conductivity with less variability (due to the smaller errors reported in Table 2 based on three time measurements).
